item.description:
we're setting this next one up on a Sunday in hopes folks will be around for Memorial weekend, and that Sunday playing will feel like Saturday since the following day many people do not work. 

If the turnout begins looking low we can look into mid June for the following one, so not so far behind this one.  But we hope the turnout for this one is great too- my in laws are around from England, so they'll be joining the group for the night too!!

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: Memorial Weekend Euchre, coming right up!!
